name: "Sew Flirty" Skirts COMBO Adult and Child Sizes Plus Ribbon Flower Pattern
description:
This lisiting is for the "Sew Flirty 2" adult skirt pattern and the "Sew Flirty" child skirt pattern plus the ribbon flower pattern all included on one COMBO pattern. 

Sizes  child 2T - 14 and adult sizes XXS-XL all included in COMBO pattern. 

Please read individual descriptions for more details.

name: "Sew Flirty" Child's Skirt Pattern with Ribbon Pattern Included
description:
“Sew Flirty” skirt is about the easiest and fastest skirt that you could possibly make. Child sizes 2T-14 are included in pattern. 

The straight cut skirt has a wide elastic band which is very stylish and popular with the younger generation. Not to speak of comfortable also. 

This is one of those skirts that you could make the day of a special occasion for that that child who has nothing to wear. I have literally made one of these skirts before church on Sunday morning. 

Also included is the ribbon flower pattern that you see on so many of my skirts, dresses and hats. 

The last picture is a reference picture for notions, yardage needed and finished measurements. 

Thank you for choosing my patterns.

name: "Sew Flirty 2" Adult's Skirt Pattern with Ribbon Flower Pattern Included
description:
“Sew Flirty 2” skirt is about the easiest and fastest skirt that you could possibly make. Sizes XXS-XL are included in pattern. 

The straight cut skirt has a wide elastic band which is very stylish and popular with the younger generation. Not to speak of comfortable also. 

This is one of those skirts that you could make the day of a special occasion for that that teen who has nothing to wear. I have literally made one of these skirts before church on Sunday morning.

I show two versions of the misses’ skirt . View 1 is made of slinky polyester which is 60” wide and the View 2 is a plaid skirt made from 42”-44” wool. The polyester skirt is much fuller than the wool skirt. Fullness depends on the weight of fabric that you choose. 

Also included is the ribbon flower pattern that you see on so many of my skirts, dresses and hats. 

The last picture shows reference page for notions, yardage needed and finished measurements. 

Thank you for choosing my patterns.

name: "Sew Modern" Reversible Bonnet Child Sizes XS-XL All Season
description:
Every little girl deserves a pretty bonnet to keep the sun and wind out of her eyes and protect her precious skin. Bonnet also covers ears for added protection. 

“Sew Modern”  bonnet offers great style and full protection from the hot and cold elements of all seasons. Choose a pretty modern and funky cotton for spring and summer and a light weight fleece for fall or winter.  

I have designed the bonnet in 3 different styles.

 View 1 reversible bonnet  has a seam between the bonnet and brim to help keep    it sturdy and also you can change the fabric at this seam to make it up to   4 coordinating  colors.  

View 2 reversible bonnet has no seam and is all one fabric construction on each side. It would be the easiest to make. Rick rack is an optional addition to this view. 

View 3 lined bonnet is my version of an heirloom bonnet. I add a row of sweet embroidery across top of bonnet where brim turns back to. I shortened the brim on this bonnet for a more tailored and dressy look. I used satin ribbon ties and roses made from the ribbon.

name: SEW BREEZY Pillowcase Top Pattern -  New Easy High Low Blouse or Tunic - PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
Super easy to make pillowcase type top with popular hi low lines and adjustable neckline. Simple construction yet very stylish. The top is hi in front with a graceful low curve in back. The silhouette of this hi low hem gives this free flowing top a slimming effect. The back has a narrow racer type cut at the neckline. 

Sizes Small to XX Large adult all on color coded lines. 
Step by step instructions with matching color photos.
Click on last picture for finished measurements, material list, notions and references. 

The tie is made of flimsy lace or dotted Swiss fabric to keep it soft around the neckline. I used sheer curtain scrap for several of the samples. 

For fabric, choose a very soft cotton such as voile, batise or Liberty cotton to give this top a “breezy” look and feel. I added lace to the cream version at the neckline and hem. 

The top looks great worn with a strapless bra or paired with a matching cami underneath. One of my easiest pattern for the beginner seamstress.

name: "Sew Precious" Baby Pillowcase Bubble Romper PDF Pattern 6M-24M
description:
“Sew Precious” pillowcase style bubble romper is just the perfect pallet for all your artistic or embroidery designs. It does not have a center seam which makes it ideal for monogramming. 

The chevron fabric sample was make with 3 rows of back ruffles and a ruffle at the neck. It also has the cutest pocket with ruffle to match. 

The hot pink sample has a ribbon accent on the front resembling grass and an appliquéd fancy bird trimmed with ribbons. The bird template is included in pattern. This sample has a self ruffle at the neck line. I used easy ribbon for the ties and secured them to the elastic inside neckline for safety. 

I am excited to show you how to make an optional simple one piece snap crotch. 

All color coded sizes from 6 months to 24 months are included.

The hat pattern is available as a separate pattern.

name: SEW HAPPY Little Girl Dress PDF Pattern Sizes 6M-6
description:
“Sew Happy”  Dress is a delight to the eye with all the colors and textures of design all combined into one outfit. 

The basic bodice is fully lined and has a back button closure. The twirly skirt has four panels that can be four different colors or prints. One side panel has a ruffled accent and the opposite panel has a cute coordinating  pocket. A wide border finishes off all the color coordinated prints in one dress. 

You can change these options around by add more ruffles or two pockets. Use as many colors or combinations that suits your eye.  The bodice can be jazzed up with more ruffles, a big bow or maybe a fabric flower. 

This year round design can be worn as a sleeveless dress in summer or paired with a blouse for cooler weather. The bodice has plenty of ease at the waist line for a comfortable fit and to layer over blouses. 

All color coded sizes from 6 months to 6 years are included in the same pattern.

name: Rick Rack Flowers
description:
Rick Rack Flower Tutorial Handmade Pattern, eBook, Epattern, Easy to Make

Rick rack flowers are fun and easy to make. Add one to your favorite hat, headband, clothing or just to pin around and look pretty. 

There is a wide array of all sizes and colors of rick rack to design your flower. There is also an endless choice of beads, buttons and baubles to make the center of the flower. 

I am showing just a few basic ways to use rick rack to add that special whimsy to your outfit. These basic steps will get you started to create your own unique designs. 

Have fun and enjoy! 

This step by step pattern is so simple to follow, even for a beginner. There are also many beautiful pictures of different flowers made with this pattern. You can make it entirely by hand stitches.

name: "Sew Vintage" Hat PDF Pattern
description:
“Sew Vintage” flouncy hat has such a cute and flattering shape for your little one. Make one to match every outfit.

The feminine hat  has two rows of flouncy ruffles surrounding the face and has a pretty bow in the back. The hat fits snuggly with elastic hidden underneath the bow in back. 

I have added an optional neck strap with adjustable snap closure. We found out that it stays on really well with just the elastic fit. Little Becka would have nothing to do with the straps around her neck!!

The hat pattern has sizes from 3 months to 24 months and all are included in the same pattern. 

A dressier version of the hat has ribbon neck ties and bow with lace around the flounces. I used French machine sewing and serger techniques on this hat. 

The sun suit seen in some of the photos is the “Sew Vintage”  Sun Suit pattern. The hat pattern is included with that pattern as a combo.

name: "Sew Vintage" Sun Suit and Hat PDF Pattern
description:
“Sew Vintage” Flouncy Sun Suit and Hat is just like the outfits that I made for my daughter 30 years ago. I remember making 5 in one day. One for each day of Vacation Bible School the following week. 

All color coded sizes from 3 months to 24 months are included for both the sun suit and hat. 

 The neck of the sun suit has a elastic casing for a comfortable fit which ties into a bow in back. The legs have elastic casing and instructions are given for an optional snap crotch. The back also has an elastic waist with 3 rows of flouncy ruffles. 

The hat pattern is included with the sun suit pattern. It has 2 rows of flouncy ruffles with a pretty bow tied in the back. The hat pattern is also available as a separate pattern.

name: "Sew Groovy" A Line Peasant Dress Sizes 6 Months - 5 Child
description:
“Sew Groovy” Peasant Dress is a softly gathered a line shaped  dress with a flattering scoop neckline. Such a sweet and comfortable dress with elastic casing around the neck and sleeves. All color coded sizes from 6 months to 5 years are included in the same pattern. 

 Some  peasant dresses look more like a paper bag with armholes cut out. “Sew Groovy” has more shapely lines and curves like the dresses from my groovy days of the 60’s.  To accomplish this pattern, I had to make the PDF pattern a full paper pattern that tapes together. Most peasant patterns are just straight pieces of fabric with armhole templates cut out. No shaping. If you do not want to tape together a full pattern then my “Sew Dainty “ blouse or under dress with just measurements and armhole templates is a good choice. 

To add BLING, I have made my sample dress from a whimsy border print. It turned a plain dress into a WOW dress. 

Need more BLING? Then add an optional bow sash or bow sash in back and flower in front or just the flower for several different looks. Just use your imagination and the sky is the limit. 

Long and ¾ sleeve versions are included in the pattern.

name: "Sew Frilly" Circle Flounce Tiered Skirt PDF Pattern Sizes 6M-6C
description:
“Sew Frilly” circle flounce skirt looks so airy and sweet with the cotton cluny  lace floating along the hems of the flounces. Sizes 6 months to 6 child all included in pattern.

This unusual skirt pattern starts with just a basic gathered straight skirt with a comfortable elastic waist. Then I have layered 3 lace trimmed circle flounces to the bottom of the skirt. There is not a single gather in the flounces but they look like ruffles. This technique works well with a solid print. The flounce blends in with the skirt and it is hardly noticeable where the under skirt ends and the flounce begins. 

I have added an optional pretty bow that ties in the middle and stays put with two belt loops hidden behind the bow. 

The look of this skirt can be changed numerous ways to make it look different. Add floating rick rack or a bias binding to the hem of the flounces .  Change the colors of the flounces to coordinating prints. 

I hope you enjoy making this skirt as much as I have enjoyed creating it.

name: "Roaring 20's" Crochet Hat Pattern, Beginner PDF Pattern with Crochet Flower and Leaves, Sizes Newbo
description:
“Roaring 20”s is a simple to make crocheted cloche hat from baby size to adult. This hat has an open weave design near the edge giving it a delicate and airy look for spring. It is finished off with a scallop edge. 

I have included instructions for making a detachable  fluffy flower and leaves. You can make this flower with less rounds and add it to a hair  band or make a hair bow or lapel pin.

name: "Flapper" Crochet Hat Pattern, Easy PDF Beginner Pattern with Crochet Flower and Leaves,  Vintage Lo
description:
“Flapper” is a simple to make crocheted cloche hat from baby size to adult. It reminds me of the 20’s era of cloche hats. This hat has a solid construction suitable for fall or winter wear. The last brim rows of the hat are called ribbed rows. They can be either one solid brim as the rainbow colored sample, 2 rows like the teen red hat, 3 rows like the baby pink hat or even with a scalloped edge like the pink hat. 

I have included instructions for making a detachable  fluffy flower and leaves. You can make this flower with less rounds and add it to a hair  band or make a hair bow or lapel pin.

name: "Cloche" Crochet Hat PDF Pattern Easy Beginner Pattern, Sizes Newborn - to Adult
description:
“Cloche” is a simple to make crocheted hat from baby size to adult. This hat has an open granny square design giving it a delicate and airy look for spring. It is finished off with a scallop edge or a plain edge with accent colors of yarn. Note: The “Cloche” and “Granny” base hats are the same hat. “Cloche” has ribbon flowers and “Granny” has the crochet fluffy flower. 

A cloche hat is a fitted, bell shaped hat that was popular during the 1920s. Cloche is the French word for bell. Often, different styles of ribbons affixed to the hats indicated different messages about the wearer.

I have included a bonus pattern for making a detachable  ribbon flower. This versatile flower can be worn on the hat, on a hair band or as a lapel pin on a garment.

name: "Granny" Crochet Hat Pattern with Fluffy Flower Easy Sizes Newborn to Adult
description:
“Granny” is a simple to make crocheted cloche hat from baby size to adult. This hat has an open granny square design giving it a delicate and airy look for spring. It is finished off with a scallop edge or a plain edge with accent colors. Note: The “Cloche” and “Granny” base hats are the same hat. “Cloche” has ribbon flowers and “Granny” has the crochet fluffy flower. 

This step by step pattern is so simple to follow, even for a beginner. There are also many beautiful pictures of different hats and flowers made with this pattern.

name: "Sew Lacy" Double Layered Pillowcase Dress PDF Pattern
description:
“Sew Lacy” is a classy double layered pillowcase dress or jumper with option for beautiful lace insertion. Sizes 6 months to 14 child are included in the PDF pattern.  In some ways this double pillowcase dress is easier to make than a regular pillowcase dress. No fussy bias binding armhole facings to deal with and the hems can be sewn by machine and still look professional. 


There are many options to mix and match to make this basic dress your own unique creation. 

Flat lace insertion 
Gathered lace insertion
Gathered ruffle fabric insertion
Double ribbon or fabric ties on shoulder
Single ribbon or fabric tie on shoulder

This versatile style can be worn alone or with a shirt underneath for cooler weather.

name: "SEW FLATTERING" Peasant Blouse PDF Pattern 6M-14
description:
This flattering peasant style blouse with ruffled neck and sleeves will be the staple of your child’s wardrobe. Make it long, ¾ or short sleeve for all seasons. 

This pattern has a scooped neck, an A-line shape and a flattering fit. The ruffles are single edged fabric to give it an airy look. You can either hem or serge the ruffle edges. 

Instructions are given for both shirred or elastic cased neckline and sleeves. Make it with the bottom ruffle to wear on the outside of skirts or jeans and make it plain bottom to wear under my pillowcase dresses or jumpers. 

This downloadable pattern has very detailed instructions and lots of photos. The pattern pieces are divided into 2 groups of sizes 6M-5 and 6-14 for clarity and ease of taping pattern pieces together. You only have to print and tape the size group that you need and cut on color coded lines. When you need another size just simply print pattern again. No wasting of tissue pattern or timely tracing of pattern.

name: "Sew Festive" Tiered PDF Skirt Pattern
description:
Get ready for any special occasion with this super easy twirling tiered skirt. Skirt tiers are put together in an easy way to assure great results. You will want to make one for every special occasion like Christmas, Valentines, Easter and Halloween and much more. Elastic waist for great fit on any figure. Skirt tiers can be made with 3 coordinating colors or one solid color. 

To add a festive look to the dress I have added some décor tutu with lots of sparkles on it. Use either fabric strips for tutu or use bought netting on a roll. Newest spring version has floating rick rack for a festive look. Use your imagination for endless looks.

name: "Sew Twirly" Tiered Peasant Dress PDF Pattern SIze 6 Mos. - 14 Child
description:
“Sew Twirly” peasant dress PDF pattern with fully gathered tiers. New Easy Scoop Neck Design - Easy PDF Sewing Pattern Downloadable Printable

She will feel so special as she twirls around and around. It is comfortable, easy to get into and just perfect for any occasion. 

You can make this dress with 5 or less color coordinating fabrics or just make it out of one solid color or print for a completely different look. Only your imagination limits you as to what you can create with this versatile pattern. 

This peasant dress has soft shirred gathers around the empire waist, neck and sleeves. The front of the neckline is scooped to give a much more flattering fit than most peasant type dress patterns. 

Also included with the pattern is options for 3 different sleeve styles. Long, three quarter or short puff sleeves.

name: "SEW VERSATILE" Reversible Aline Jumper w/ Big Bow
description:
"SEW VERSATILE" Reversible Aline Jumper Dress Pattern PDF Sewing Pattern 6 Mos. - 6 Child

“SEW VERSATILE” A-line Reversible Jumper is the perfect garment for that special little girl. It is so comfortable, easy to get into and just perfect for almost any occasion. 

You can make it reversible with the snap on buttons or you can just simply line it for a quick new outfit. Perfect for monogramming as in the Cookie Monster dress. Only your imagination limits you as to what you can create with this versatile pattern. 

Two different ideas will be shown in the instructions. One with a cute pocket on one side and the "Sew Big Bow” on the other side. The second is an appliquéd flower and covered buttons on one side and the “Sew Big Bow” on the other side. The "Sew Big Bow" pattern is included within this pattern for free. 


The under dress shown in some of the photos is a separate pattern called "Sew Dainty". It is available in my store or you can look for a combo deal with this jumper and underdress for $14.95. The matching "Sew Handsome" jon jon suit is a new pattern in the store. 

I PROMISE you one of the most detailed patterns on the market. Your pattern will be concise, colorful, and professionally displayed in photos, templates, graphs and measurement charts. No homemade, hand drawn, or "figure it out yourself" tissue patterns here. You will be pleasantly surprised at the details of my patterns. 

If you have any questions or need further help, I am just an email away. 

I legally own the information that I am selling. It is my own intellectual property. I designed my own garments and I also designed and published my own PDF files. Copyright will be shown on the PDF file.

name: "SEW STYLISH" Pillowcase PDF Pattern Size 6 months-14 child
description:
Super easy to make dress or jumper, for the cutest girl ever! Simple lines yet very stylish. Updated pillowcase dress with a safe and adjustable neckline and detachable bow. Optional  pleated or ruffled insert and coordinating border. 

This dress is easy on and off for the independent child who dresses themselves. The neckline has an adjustable buttonhole elastic hidden within the casing.  It has a removable bow .  

This versatile style can be worn alone or with a shirt underneath for cooler weather
 
Under slip shown with some samples is the “Sew Dainty” slip or blouse  pattern.

name: "SEW HANDSOME" Jon Jon Reversible Romper 6 Mos - 6 Child
description:
“Sew Handsome” jon jon is the perfect garment for that special little boy. It is so comfortable, easy to get into and just perfect for almost any occasion. Jon jons can be worn with a shirt underneath for a dressier look or shirtless for a more playful and casual outfit. The jon jon is also know as a shortall,  longall or romper. 

Pattern includes sizes 6 months to a child size 6. 

I have included several appliqués and instructions to decorate your jon jon with. Perfect for monogramming too! This pattern is also reversible. I also include steps on adding a snap crotch and patch back or side cargo pockets. Only your imagination limits you as to what you can create with this versatile pattern.

name: "SEW EASY" Pillowcase Dress Pattern - Size 6 mos baby -14 child - PDF Sewing Tutorial
description:
"SEW EASY" Pillowcase Dress Pattern - size 6 mos baby -14 child - PDF Sewing Pattern 

Super easy to make pillowcase dress or jumper, for the cutest girl ever! Simple lines, yet very stylish. My easiest pattern for the beginner seamstress. 

There are many options to mix and match to make this basic dress your own unique creation. 

Double ribbon or fabric ties on shoulder
Single ribbon or fabric tie on shoulder
Button Neck Band
Solid Fabric Dress
Coordinating Hem Band 

This versatile style can be worn alone or with a shirt underneath for back to school and cooler weather. 

I PROMISE you one of the most detailed patterns on the market. Your pattern will be concise, colorful, and professionally displayed in photos, templates, graphs and measurement charts. No homemade, hand drawn, or "figure it out yourself" tissue patterns here. You will be pleasantly surprised at the details of my patterns. 

If you have any questions or need further help, I am just an email away. 

I legally own the information that I am selling. It is my own intellectual property. I designed my own garments and I also designed and published my own PDF files. Copyright will be shown on the PDF file.

name: SEW SASSY PDF Skirt Pattern SIze 2T-14 Easy Beginner Sewing Pattern
description:
Super easy to make skirt in sizes 2T – 14.  Simple lines yet very sassy and stylish. Elastic waist for great fit on any figure. Skirt can be made with a coordinating border, one solid color or striped with many colors. Use your imagination for endless looks

This design is very basic for the beginning seamstress but also has more advanced options such as the gathered insert  and border hem. 

I have also added an updated one color skirt with an appliquéd flower, leaves and rick rack design.

name: German Bell Paper Crafted Christmas Ornament PDF Pattern
description:
Thank you for choosing this PDF pattern for making a German bell ornament.  I am sure you will enjoy making them. 

There are so many different materials that you can make these ornaments out of.  Beware you may get carried away! In years past, I made these out of Christmas cards, paper plates, and copies of my flowers. Recently , I discovered the awesome choices of using scrapbooking papers. I am helplessly hooked. 

I am surely not the inventor of this design but I have went steps further than just the basic folded ornament to give you the best ornament look possible. I also show how to make an angel ornament. 

I usually use two complimentary colors of ribbon and assorted embellishment to get the opulent  effect.  I also make a line of themed ornaments.

name: "Epcot" Paper Crafted Christmas Ornament PDF Pattern
description:
Thank you for choosing this PDF pattern for making my “EPCOT” ornament.   

I am sure you will enjoy making them. I am surely not the inventor of this design but I have went steps further than just the basic folded ornament to give you the best ornament look possible. I named it “EPCOT” because it looks similar to the EPCOT GEOSPHERE at Disney World.

There are so many different materials that you can make these ornaments out of.  Beware you may get carried away! In years past, I made these out of Christmas cards, paper plates, and copies of my flowers. Recently , I discovered the awesome choices of using scrapbooking papers. I am helplessly hooked. 

I usually use two complimentary colors of ribbon bow topper and assorted embellishment to get the opulent  effect.

name: Quilted Christmas Ornament PDF Pattern
description:
This beautiful and unique OOAK ornament will be the conversation piece of your Victorian or Shabby Chic home or Christmas tree.

Each ornament starts with choosing the fabric or ribbon, then choosing the perfect addition of coordinating ribbon, baubles, mini ornaments, charms, angels, beads etc.

I will show you how to make these "over the top" ornaments which have more layers and trims than most common quilted ornaments on the market.

You will receive a complete supply list and ideas to make your ornament uniquely yours. Themed ornaments are great for gifts. 

This beautifully designed pattern is concise but loaded with instructions and colorful pictures. You will receive step by step detailed photos and descriptions along with accurate templates to make your ornament.

name: "SEW CLASSY" Skirt and Ribbon Flower
description:
Super easy to make skirt in sizes 3/4 – 13/14 junior/misses. Simple lines yet very stylish. Only 3 pattern pieces. Slenderizing arched or pointed front band which cleverly joins an elastic back for comfort and great fit. 

Great back to school, church or date skirt. Most sizes only take 1 yard of 45" material. 

This design stems from a pattern that I used many , many years ago . How many years? I have been sewing for 50+ years.  I remember making myself skirts and shorts similar to this waist design  when I was just in elementary school. 

Also included with this pattern is the original Ribbon Flower PDF Pattern with new flower designs added.  The flower pins add a touch of dress up to the skirts . Take them off for a more casual look.

name: Crochet Cloche Hat and Flower Combo Pattern, Beanie, PDF Epattern, Sizes Newborn-Adult Easy F
description:
Simple to make crochet cloche hat pattern from baby size to adult. The crochet hat pattern is created with just basic double crochet, single crochet and slip stitches. I have also included instructions for starting with a magic ring, which gives a smooth tight center. 


I have made my hat with 100% cotton yarn, but most any medium to light weight yarn is suitable. You will only need to know basic crochet skills to accomplish construction of this hat. Size is determined by measurements and not by crochet gauge, making it easy to accomplish a perfect fit. 

This step by step pattern is so simple to follow, even for a beginner. There are also many beautiful pictures of different hats made with this pattern. 

Also included in this pattern is the ribbon flowers which are simple to make to add to your favorite hat, headband, clothing or just to pin around and look pretty. 


This step by step pattern is so simple to follow, even for a beginner. There are also many beautiful pictures of different flowers made with this pattern. You can use a sewign machine or make it entirely by hand stitches.

name: Ribbon Flower PDF Pattern Accessory on Hat, Headband, Clothing, Brooch, Pin, Facinator, Cloche
description:
Simple to make Ribbon Flower to add to your favorite hat, headband, clothing or just to pin around and look pretty. 

This step by step ribbon flower pattern is so simple to follow, even for a beginner. There are also many beautiful pictures of different flowers made with this pattern. You can use a sewing machine or make it entirely by hand stitches. 

If you like the hats in the photos, then you can find the pattern for a Crochet Cloche Hat in my shop. Want both? Save money and buy the combo pack listed.

name: "SEW WISE" Owl Family Pillows
description:
Easy to make “Sew Wise” Owl family. Papa, Mama, Bro, and Sissy all coordinating together as a “wise” family should. 

Not too scary. Just loving and bright. Great for little ones to cuddle and love.  Ideal take along  size for that nap on the road. 

This was my “fun” pattern to create. Babies just  love to snuggle with it and drag it around by the ears.  As you can see, Hayden was quite amused with my first sample. 

Baby friendly, with all pieces appliquéd to main body. No dangerous buttons or loose parts to chew off.  I have used 100% cotton fabrics, washable felt and filled the body with  fiber fill.  Just toss in the washer and lay flat to dry. 

If  you want to create this owl as bookends, just fill the bottom with beans or pellets. It has a square bottom so that it will sit up.

name: "SEW GIRLY" Tutu Dress 12 Months - 6 Child
description:
"SEW GIRLY" 
Tutu Dress 
PDF Pattern 
Size 12 months - 6 child 
Easy Beginner Sewing 

“Sew Girly” dress or jumper is the perfect garment for that special little girl. She will feel all dressed up with the ribbon bows and the tutu underneath. It is so comfortable, easy to get into and just perfect for almost any occasion. 

You can make it with the tutu under slip and bows or just plain with snap on buttons. Perfect for monogramming too! Only your imagination limits you as to what you can create with this versatile pattern. 

This jumper pattern is not reversible. Many people have asked for a more simple pattern with just a facing and hem. No buttonholes either unless you want them. Straps are secured with snaps. Bows and covered buttons just snap on. 

The neckline of this dress is similar to the “Sew Versatile” reversible jumper. This dress has more swing around the bottom for twirling around. 

Thank you for choosing my patterns. This is a PATTERN for a dress. It is not a completed dress. 

I PROMISE you one of the most detailed patterns on the market. Your pattern will be concise, colorful, and professionally displayed in photos, templates, graphs and measurement charts. No homemade, hand drawn, or "figure it out yourself" tissue patterns here. You will be pleasantly surprised at the details of my patterns

name: "SEW DAINTY" Underslip 12 Mos - 6 Child
description:
Super easy to make under slip or blouse, for the cutest girl ever!  Simple peasant  lines yet very stylish.  

Shown is a long sleeve version make of cotton batiste. This slip has elastic neckline and sleeves. Included is also a short sleeve blouse version.  Mix and match sleeve lengths on blouse or slip. 

The neckline and sleeves have a ½” self ruffle to give it that “dainty” look for  that special  little girl.

name: "SEW ADORABLE" Shirred Underdress 12 Mos - 6 Child
description:
Super easy to make under slip, for the cutest girl ever! Simple lines yet very stylish.  

This under dress goes with so many outfits from pillowcase dresses to skirts. It adds that special bling to a plain outfit transforming it into a boutique look. 

The under dress has peasant lines with shirred bodice and sleeves. Shirring is so simple to accomplish and when finished looks almost like smocking. It takes only minutes to add the shirring.

This versatile style can be worn alone as a dress if made from a heavier cotton. My samples are made of batiste. One of my samples has a antique lace frill that I have been saving for that special outfit.

name: "SEW FLOUNCY" Tiered Sundress 6 mos - 6 Child
description:
Super easy to make tiered pillowcase dress or jumper, for the cutest girl ever!  Simple lines, yet very stylish. Three  rows of slightly gathered tiers create the flouncy and feminine look of this dress. So cool and fun to twirl around in. Changes of materials and prints or solids will make this a favorite for that boutique look. 

The sample dress was made of Dotted Swiss in four coordinating colors. The white dress is made of 3 different eyelet materials with the bottom one having a scalloped edge. 

There are many neck line options to mix and match to make this tiered dress your own unique creation. 

Double ribbon or fabric ties on shoulder
Single ribbon or fabric tie on shoulder
Button Neck Band

This versatile style can be worn alone or with a shirt underneath for cooler weather.

name: "SEW CUTE" Dress  6 mos - 14 child
description:
Easy to sew ruffled top sundress,  jumper or top.

Simple lines yet very stylish. Only 3 pattern pieces. Updated pillowcase type dress with a ruffled top, strap variations and coordinating border. 

This dress is inspired by is a design that I smocked for my daughter when she was little. That was nearly 30 years ago. I just replaced the smocking with a simpler elastic casing which forms a pretty ruffle front and back. I then added a funky coordinating border hem. 

This versatile style can be worn alone or with a shirt underneath for cooler weather.

 I have included instructions for what I call bungee straps and traditional bows tied at the shoulders.

name: "SEW COOL" Empire Waist Dress or Top Adult sizes XXS-2X
description:
Super easy to make dress, jumper, or top in sizes XXS–2X. Simple lines yet very stylish. Only 3 pattern pieces. Updated pillowcase type dress with an elastic top, empire waist, and bungee straps for an easy fit.  Can be made with a coordinating border, plain or if you are lucky you can find a beautiful border print like the model is wearing. 

This versatile style can be worn alone or with a shirt underneath for cooler weather.

name: Kanzashi Style Fabric Flower PDF Pattern, Easy to Make Japanese Art
description:
Kanzashi style fabric flower with a covered button center. 


Kanzashi is the Japanese art of folding silk squares into petals. Although this is not the traditional origami-like folds of a Kanzashi flower, it is a super easy way to get the same look and stylish design. 

I have taken this beautiful tradition and translated it into something fun, casual and functional for today’s fashions. The flowers look so much more complicated to make than they really are. 

You can make it with scraps or groupings out of quilting fun packs. I used cotton, but any suitable weight fabric can be used. 

This is just one of the basic styles of this Kanzashi tradition. With these basic steps you will be able to create endless possibilities. Change the covered button center and use vintage buttons or beads. You can make one layer or two. Add a trail of beads and you have a traditional Japanese Kanzashi look. It is up to you and your imagination. Be creative and add some whimsy to your wardrobe.

 I use this flower on my “Sew Retro” dress, pocketbooks, as a lapel pin, on headbands and hats, and just as a simple hair bow. The ways to use it are also endless. 

I PROMISE you one of the most detailed patterns on the market. Your pattern will be concise, colorful, informative and professionally displayed. You will be pleasantly surprised at the details of my patterns. If you are not happy, then your money will be promptly refunded.

If you have any questions or need further help, I am just an email away. 


I legally own the information that I am selling. It is my own intellectual property. I designed my own items and I also designed and published my own PDF files. Copyright will be shown on the PDF file.

name: "SEW SENTIMENTAL" Dress from Dad's Dress Shirt 50% OFF
description:
"SEW SENTIMENTAL" 
Peasant Dress Made from Dad's Shirt
PDF Pattern
Size 6 mos - 6 child

On Sale for a limited time at 50% OFF - Make one for the 4th of July as pictured!

With all the upcycling, repurposing and reusing articles, I decide to give my spin on the idea. I have seen many dresses or garments made from a man’s dress shirt. Honestly, most still look like a man’s shirt. I decided to try to create the best looking one possible that really looks like it belongs on the child. 

To create this effect you have to be willing to go the extra mile to add all the details that transform the shirt into a darling dress. 

I have added red buttons and red rick rack to accent the blue and white of this shirt. It adds that special bling to a plain shirt transforming it into a boutique look. You can use your own imagination to creat your OOAK dress made from Dad's shirt.

name: Traditional Christmas Stocking PDF Pattern
description: There are so many different materials that you can make these stockings  out of.  Beware you may get carried away! Choosing the material is the first step in creating what theme that your want to use. I show three designs as my samples. Traditional greens, reds and golds with red braid. This tailored look is great for a man’s stocking. I picked out a lime green and red and gold for an updated color scheme and more modern look. Last, I picked out combinations from Northcott fabric collection “Quest for a Cure”. This makes a very pretty and feminine Victorian or Shabby Chic stocking.

name: "QUILT AS YOU GO" Grandmother's Flower Garden Quilting Pattern
description:
Easy, quick and fun to make Grandmother’s Flower Garden  “quilt as you go” PDF pattern. This pattern is all you need to create many designs from a simple coaster , pot holder, place mat, table runner all the way to any size quilt. 

The name for the procedure is called folded hexagon Australian patchwork or framed hexagon. This is a great way to use individual flowers for the center of your project. 

Each hexagon is pieced one at a time and has three basic pieces. Front, back and batting. You will sew all three together at once and when you are done, you have a completed “mini quilt”. When they are joined together as a hot pad, place mat or quilt, you are finished!  A coaster is just one completed hexagon. 

This project is so portable. I take my pieces around to ball games in a sewing tin pail. 
 
I have made a pot holder and place mat for my sewing machine sample. I have used a zigzag stitch but I am sure there are other stitches that would be pretty too. 

This is also a lovely hand piecing project. For the hand pieced sample, I have chosen a tea cup design and hand quilted around the outline of each cup. 

This is also a cute pattern for an “I Spy” quilt.
